users.description: List of GitLab instances with authorization

templateDir.description: Local directory to use for template storage (default "$XDG_CACHE_HOME/act3/pt/templates")

worktreeDir.description: Local directory to use for Git worktrees (default "$XDG_CACHE_HOME/act3/pt/worktrees")

cacheDir.description: Local directory to use for for general cache (default "$XDG_CACHE_HOME/act3/pt/cache")

catalog.description: Git Repository URL or path to a template catalog (default "https://git.act3-ace.com/devsecops/project-templates/catalog.git")

ci.description: For CI pipeline use. When enabled, act3-pt will use CI_JOB_TOKEN for read operations

urlType.description: URL protocol to use for Git operations, either SSH or HTTPS ("ssh"/"https")

Configuration.description: Configuration type is used to store a user's current configuration settings

name.description: Name for the GitLab instance (ex. act3)

url.description: URL to the GitLab instance (i.e. git.act3-ace.com)

User.description: User stores authorization for a GitLab user
